channel.title: Fear Laptop on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Fear Laptop on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: calm
item.description: i feel a lot better. wirk is good. my relationship with k*star is no longer, well I mean it is still there.. but we have decided to take a little break. I hope with all of my heart that it is little.. But we part as friends.. and we really didn’t part. It is still really sad.. but I am getting through it. I ordered a new laptop… ha new.. I ordered a laptop.
